column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've had several of their pastries: Almond Croissant
column4: Hazelnut Brioche....of which the Almond Croissant is by far my favorite. The Fruit Croissant was kind of hard
column5: the Kugelhopf and Hazelnut Brioche were both ordinary in my opinion. And both times we came here
column6: the Hawaiian Royale has been our go to entree (which my husband claims he would pay $50 for). But the menu changes
column7: so there's no telling if it will still be there the next time we go back.
